<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Download attachments"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/2.0/mail/messages/attachment/downloadall/{messageId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Downloads all the attachments from the message with the ID specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"messageId","in":"path","description":"Message ID","schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Attachment archive","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"Completed":{"type":"boolean","example":"true"},"Id":{"type":"string","example":"Id"},"Status":{"type":"string","example":"Status"},"Error":{"type":"string","example":"Error"},"Percents":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":"100"},"Source":{"type":"string","example":"Source"},"OperationType":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":"1"},"Operation":{"type":"string","example":"Operation"}},"title":"MailOperationStatus"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
